original_text: And beside all this, between us and you there is a great gulf fixed: so that they which would pass from hence to you cannot; neither can they pass to us, that would come from thence.
korean_text: 그뿐 아니라 너희와 우리 사이에 큰 구렁텅이가 놓여 있어 여기서 너희에게 건너가고자 하되 갈 수 없고 거기서 우리에게 건너올 수도 없게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: there is a great gulf fixed
so that they which would pass from hence to you cannot
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 여기서 너희에게로 건너가려는 자들이 할 수 없고

sentences.original_text: neither can they pass to us
